title: shrIdhara venkatEsham
sahitya:
shrIdhara venkaTEsham sadgurum bhajE


anupallavi

  sAdhu sandOHa sanjIvana dAyinam
satatam shiva nAmAmrta bAyinam


caraNam    nigama sAra vidam nija sanyAsinam nikhila jIva karuNAkara hAsinam
jagadIkyAda sahajIpura vAsinam shrIkara pasitha rudrAkSa vibhAsinam
